alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Garden; Keith; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 6:27PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Perkins, Keith, southeastern Garden and eastern Deuel Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kingsley Dam to 6 miles south of Barton. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ogallala, Big Springs, Brule, Lewellen, Barton, Lemoyne, Keystone, Roscoe, Kingsley Dam, Eagle Gulch Campground, Clear Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Otter Creek Campground, Lake View Campground, Ash Hollow State Historical Park,and Wild Horse Spring. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 69 and 105. Highway 92 between mile markers 115 and 138. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 91 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
